snippet: After missing six months with chronic left knee problems and another month and the Australian Open because of a stomach virus, Rafael Nadal has won 10 titles, including his second United States Open.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column observes that Rafael Nadal has had a surprisingly triumphant season, winning 10 titles after missing six months with chronic knee problems and another month and the Australian Open because of a stomach virus.
lead_paragraph: After missing six months with chronic left knee problems and another month and the Australian Open because of a stomach virus, Rafael Nadal has won 10 titles, including his second United States Open.

headline.main: After Injury and Illness, a Surprisingly Triumphant Season for Nadal
headline.print_headline:
Nadal, After Injury and Illness,
Enjoys Surprisingly Triumphant Season
